member_organisations: FinUnions is the Brussels representation of SAK, STTK and YTN.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
head_office_address: FinUnions Boulevard du Roi Albert II 5
eu_initiatives: FinUnions follows all EU policies that are relevant to the interests of the members of our affiliated trade unions, and of employees more generally. Our particular focus is on social, labour and economic policies. FinUnions works on behalf of its member federations to ensure that the voice of workers in Finland is heard in European policy-making.
organisation_name: Finnish trade union representation to the EU
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Committee on free movement of workers#X01784#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1784#Member#C
membership: FinUnions represents the trade union confederations in Finland. The total membership of their affiliated unions is 1.7 million.
goals__remit:
FinUnions represents Finnish trade union confederations (SAK, STTK and YTN) in Brussels. 
 
For further information on the confederations and their objectives: 
 
SAK: www.sak.fi 
STTK: www.sttk.fi 
YTN: www.ytn.fi
relevant_communication: FinUnions publishes information on working life related EU policies and decision making. We also cooperate with various partners in order to raise issues that are important to our members.
